alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 12 at 1:26PM MST until August 12 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 230 PM MST. * At 126 PM MST, a wall of dust was near Sun Lakes, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 162 and 189. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 143 and 162. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 52 and 54. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Bapchule, Olberg, Blackwater, Firebird Lake, Sacaton and Santan. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
